name: Drawing Board (METOUR, Rowan Allcorn, DrewGodden, David D'Orazio)
name_original: Drawing Board (METOUR, Rowan Allcorn, DrewGodden, David D'Orazio)
description:
Use WASD to move and a mouse to aim and shoot.

Don't touch anything red.

Shoot enemy's off screen to kill them.

This game was made in the 3 hour game jam, TriJam.

There isn't fullscreen.
